body_html: Based on the problem description, it sounds like you are writing the model directly to the directory that TensorFlow Serving is polling for new model versions. Instead, please export (or copy/upload if that is your workflow) to a temporary directory, and then use one of the atomic file operations such as move, to move the saved model directory into place.
body_text: Based on the problem description, it sounds like you are writing the model directly to the directory that TensorFlow Serving is polling for new model versions. body: Based on the problem description, it sounds like you are writing the model directly to the directory that TensorFlow Serving is polling for new model versions. Instead, please export (or copy/upload if that is your workflow) to a temporary directory, and then use one of the atomic file operations such as move, to move the saved model directory into place.
